Metadata.Title: CVE-2018-25032 affecting package python2 for versions less than 2.7.18-13
Metadata.Description: CVE-2018-25032 affecting package python2 for versions less than 2.7.18-13. This CVE either no longer is or was never applicable.

Criterion.Comment: Package python2 is earlier than 2.7.18-13, affected by CVE-2018-25032
